prompts: Create a dark-type Pokemon with a fierce appearance and striking patterns on its fur.
Imagine a unique Pokemon that blends elements of a wolf and a punk rock star.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of rebellion and urban culture.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in city environments and has a gritty, tough demeanor.
Generate a creature that has a mix of gray and black fur, with bold accents.
Make a Pokemon that showcases a strong stance, ready to defend its territory.
Give me a Pokemon that has an edgy look and is known for its cunning tactics.
